resources.string:
<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="target-densitydpi=high-dpi" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <link rel="stylesheet" media="screen and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio:1.5)" href="hdpi.css" /> </head> <body style="background:black;margin:0 0 0 0; padding:0 0 0 0;"> <iframe id="sc-widget" src="%s" frameborder="no" scrolling="no">
</iframe> <script src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/api.js" type="text/javascript"></script> </body> </html>
